Class EBRetryStrategySimple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enigmabridge.retry.EBRetryStrategySimple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EBRetryStrategy

    public class EBRetryStrategySimple
extends Object
implements EBRetryStrategy
    Simple retry strategy, with threshold, no waiting. Created by dusanklinec on 21.07.16.
